name: Rituale Scandalum VR | Demo (DE)
description:
Welcome to Rituale Scandalum! (Codename: Exorzubi)
Take on the role of an exorcist’s apprentice performing their first own exorcism. Destroy the demons Horcruxes and make sure it stays calm!

  • Room tracked VR Game | Tested with HTC Vive 1st Gen
  • German (DE) voices only
  • This is a demo only

This game has been originally developed as a student project created at the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, Campus Hagenberg during the Digital Arts master's program:
